1.title: Burger
1.plot: This competition pits home cooks and pro chefs from around the world against one another in the ultimate burger battle! After fighting through regional qualifiers around the globe, these grill masters are bringing the heat to Las Vegas for the championship. In the first round, the chefs must create a signature burger. In round two they have to add a delicious new twist to a classic patty preparation. The field is then narrowed to the top ten, and their challenge in round three is to use a mystery ingredient in their burger.

2.title: Bacon
2.plot: The chefs must create a signature bacon dish, reinvent a classic, and make use of a mystery ingredient in order to win the title of 'Bacon World Champion' and advance in the competition.

3.title: Sandwich
3.plot: The chefs must create a signature sandwich, reinvent a classic, and use a mystery ingredient in the sandwich of their choice.

4.title: Pasta
4.plot: The chefs must create a signature pasta dish, add a new twist to a classic noodle dish, and get inventive with a mystery ingredient.

5.title: BBQ
5.plot: Pit masters face off in a two round showdown to determine who is the best of the best.

6.title: Finale
6.plot: There are only two challenges standing between the chef-testants and the grand prize. First, the finalists must create a crowd pleaser dish with a Vegas theme.

locations: Fremont Street, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA::(Location where tournament took place)

imdb.title: World Food Championships
plot: The _World Food Championships_ (qv) features nearly 500 competitors seeking food fame and fortune in Las Vegas.::Anonymous
